lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qau skl iniD pUrn smuMdR ibKY; hMs mrjIvw inhcY pRswdu pwvhI [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as treasures of pearls and diamonds are found in the sea, but only a seasoned evaluator of these precious stones who can dive deep into the bottom of sea can surely enjoy the pleasure of picking them up from there.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ nwl sB Bwˆq dIAwˆ inDIAwˆ smuMdR ivKy BrpUr huMdIAwˆ hn, pr hMs Xw mrjIvw smuMdRI toBw hI inscy kr ky smuMdR pwsoˆ ienwˆ dI pRswd pRsMnqw meI Byt nUM pRwpq kr skdy hn, hwrI swrI nhIˆ[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy prbq hIrw mwnk pwrs isD; Knvwrw Kin jig ivKy pRgtwvhI [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as mountains have diamonds, rubies and philosopher stones those can purify metals into gold, but only an adept excavator can bring them out before the world.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ prbq AMdr hIry mxIAwˆ qy pwrs huMdy hn, pr is`D qy Kwx KojI purK hI ienHwˆ nUM Koj Aqy pu`t ky jgq ivKy pRis`D krdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy bn ibKY milAwgr sODw kpUr; soD kY subwsI subws ibhswvhI [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as a jungle has many aromatic trees like sandalwood, camphor etc., but only a perfumery expert can bring their fragrance out.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ bn ivKy milAwgr cMnx soDw kpUr gMD swr GIAw kpUr Awid sugMDIAwˆ huMdIAwˆ hn, pr subwsI soˆGw soD kY FUMF Bwl ky ienwˆ dI sugMDI nUM ibhswveI KyVidAw krdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gurbwnI ibKY skl pdwrQ hY; joeI joeI KojY soeI soeI inpjwvhI [546[

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Similarly Gurbani has all the precious items but whosoever would search and research them, he would be rewarded with those items that he so fondly desires.  (546)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqsI pRkwr gurbwxI ivKy Drm ArQ kwm moK rUp sB pdwrQ hI hn, pr ijhVw ijhVw Kojygw, Eho Eho hI pRgt kr lvygw[ AQvw ijs ijs pdwrQ dw KojI ho ky jo koeI Kojy Eho Eho hI pdwrQ Es dy swmny pRgt ho AwieAw krdw hY ]546]
